content.question: Which of the following will cause a rightward shift of the short-run aggregate supply curve?

choices.label: A decrease in the price level
A decrease in the costs of production

content.answer: A decrease in the costs of production

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
